actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-879.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of an amendment to the Senate amendment on (H.R. 2769) to promote economic revitalization and facilitate expansion of economic opportunities in the Caribbean Basin region.

summary.text: Provides for consideration of an amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 2769 (Caribbean Basin region economic development).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of an amendment to the Senate amendment on (H.R. 2769) to promote economic revitalization and facilitate expansion of economic opportunities in the Caribbean Basin region.
